bane_of_arthropods.name: Bane of Arthropods
bane_of_arthropods.summary:
Increases damage to arthropods.
Mutually exclusive with Smite and Sharpness.

binding_curse.name: Curse of Binding
binding_curse.summary: Prevents removal of items from armor slots (except when in creative).

blast_protection.name: Blast Protection
blast_protection.summary:
Reduces explosion damage and knockback.
Mutually exclusive with other protections.

channeling.name: Channeling
channeling.summary:
Trident "channels" a bolt of lightning toward a hit entity. Functions only during thunderstorms and if target is unobstructed with opaque blocks.
Mutually exclusive with Riptide.

depth_strider.name: Depth Strider
depth_strider.summary:
Increases underwater movement speed.
Mutually exclusive with Frost Walker.

efficiency.name: Efficiency
efficiency.summary: Increases mining speed. When applied to an axe it increases the chance that the axe may stun a shield, with the base chance being 25% and a 5% increase for each level of efficiency.

fire_protection.name: Fire Protection
fire_protection.summary:
Reduces fire damage and burn time.
Mutually exclusive with other protections.

fortune.name: Fortune
fortune.summary:
Increases certain block drops.
Mutually exclusive with Silk Touch.

frost_walker.name: Frost Walker
frost_walker.summary:
Turns water beneath the player into frosted ice.
Mutually exclusive with Depth Strider.

impaling.name: Impaling
impaling.summary: Trident deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean. In Bedrock Edition, having impaling on a trident also deals extra damage to players or mobs in water or rain.

infinity.name: Infinity
infinity.summary:
Shooting consumes no regular arrows.
Mutually exclusive with Mending.

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.summary:
Trident returns after being thrown. Higher levels reduce return time.
Mutually exclusive with Riptide.

mending.name: Mending
mending.summary:
Repair items with experience.
Cannot be combined with Infinity, tools with Mending must be being held in hand in order to repair while gaining XP.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.summary:
Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one; only one arrow can be recovered.
Mutually exclusive with Piercing.

piercing.name: Piercing
piercing.summary:
Arrows pass through multiple entities.
Mutually exclusive with Multishot.

projectile_protection.name: Projectile Protection
projectile_protection.summary:
Reduces projectile damage.
Mutually exclusive with other protections.

protection.name: Protection
protection.summary:
Reduces explosion damage and knockback.
Mutually exclusive with other protections.

riptide.name: Riptide
riptide.summary:
Trident launches player with itself when thrown. Functions only in water or rain.
Mutually exclusive with Channeling and Loyalty.

sharpness.name: Sharpness
sharpness.summary:
Increases damage.
Mutually exclusive with Bane of Arthropods and Smite.

silk_touch.name: Silk Touch
silk_touch.summary:
Mined blocks drop themselves.
Mutually exclusive with Fortune, Looting and Luck of the Sea.

smite.name: Smite
smite.summary:
Increases damage to undead mobs.
Mutually exclusive with Bane of Arthropods and Sharpness.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.summary: Reflects some of the damage taken.
